title: Aircraft Noise Report Summary
description: Please see the Aircraft Noise Reports dataset for more detailed data from August 2019 and later. A. SUMMARY Counts of aircraft noise complaints by community and by month. The Aircraft Noise Abatement Office collects this data via the Complaint Hotline, Online Complaint Form, emails, letters and telephone calls to our office. This information is collected and published in a monthly report which is presented at the SFO Airport Community Roundtable meetings. It is used to understand community's aircraft noise concerns, to collaborate with stakeholders in an effort to reduce and manage aircraft noise.

columns.name: Year
columns.description: The year of the aircraft noise complaint disturbance.

columns.name: Month
columns.description: The month of the aircraft noise complaint disturbance.

columns.name: Community
columns.description: The name of the community where the aircraft noise disturbance occurred.

columns.name: Total Complaints
columns.description: The number of monthly complaints associated by community.

columns.name: Total Number of Callers
columns.description: The number of Complainants associated by community.   The term “caller” is inclusive of all methods of contacting the SFO Noise Office. These would include: telephone, email, web form, WebTrak Noise App, SFO Noise App and direct calls.

columns.name: data_as_of
columns.description: Date and time source data was updated.

columns.name: data_loaded_at
columns.description: Date the data was loaded onto the Open Data Portal
